lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Hey honey, how's it going ?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Boy, am I relieved to finally find a kiosk in this town

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Could you do me favor and get me a pack of Hotshots? It's the cigarettes with the red box

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Could I check your ID first ?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Oh right, my mistake. I'm not used to getting my ID checked nowadays.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Could you do me a favor and get me a pack of Hotshots? It's the cigarettes with the red box.

responses.responseText: Could I get your basic info ?
Could I get your date of birth?

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Hotshots! Cigarettes: 14,99 NEUR. Make the sale?

responses.responseText: Are you from out of town?
Wait, you don't get your ID checked?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: I miss when bad habits were cheaper.. Thanks, hun. Don't pick up smoking if you haven't already.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: I sure am. I'm taking some time away from my crummy job to see the world! I'm starting with backwater towns like this – the type that's so unremarkable that not a lot of people would come visit.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Oh, no offense – places like these have the peace and quiet I so desperately need.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: None taken.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Ohh, are you looking to send me a love letter? I'm flattered honey, but I dont think you need that to sell me cigarettes.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: You got it, hun.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Of course, hun. Here you go.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Ohh, you don't think I look that old, do you? How sweet of you to say.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: But really, no - my usual haunts back home already know me well, so they don't even need to ask.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Uhh, on second thought…

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Huh, what?

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Sorry ma'am, I just can't sell you that.

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Huh, what? Why not?

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: Ughh, forget it. Don't waste my time.

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Hotshots! Cigarettes: 15 NEUR. Make the sale?

lines.speaker: Clerk:
lines.text: Uhh, on second thought...

lines.speaker: Customer:
lines.text: And here's a little extra for being a sweetheart and taking the time to chat with a hag like me.
